Detailed Description

Documents node_export's hooks for api reference.

Function Documentation

hook_node_export_access_alter ( &$  access,
$  node 
)

Override export access on a node.

Let other modules alter this - for example to only allow some users to export specific nodes or types.

Parameters:
&$access Boolean access value for current user.
$node The node to determine access for.

hook_node_export_format_handlers (  ) 

Register a format handler, for exporting code using other methods.

Returns:
An array keyed by format names containing an array with keys title and module, where the value for title is the display name of the format, and the value for module is the module that implements it.

hook_node_export_node_alter ( &$  node,
$  original_node,
$  method 
)

Manipulate a node on import/export.

Parameters:
&$node The node to alter.
$original_node The unaltered node.
$method 'export' for exports, and 'prepopulate' or 'save-edit' for imports depending on the method used.

hook_node_export_node_bulk_alter ( &$  nodes,
$  op 
)

Manipulate node array before bulk export or import.

The purpose of this is to allow a module to check nodes in the array for two or more nodes that must retain a relationship, and to add/remove other data to the array to assist with maintaining dependencies, relationships, references, and additional data required by the nodes.

Parameters:
&$nodes The node array to alter.
$op 'import', 'after import', or 'export'.

hook_node_export_node_bulk_encode_alter ( &$  node_code,
$  nodes,
$  format 
)

Circumvent the default bulk node export output method.

Parameters:
&$node_code The node export code. Leave as FALSE for no change.
$nodes The node.
$format A string indicating what the export format is, and whether to do anything.

hook_node_export_node_decode_alter ( &$  return,
$  string 
)

Circumvent the default node import method.

Parameters:
&$return The array/object to return to node export.
$string The node code.

hook_node_export_node_encode_alter ( &$  return,
$  var,
$  format 
)

Circumvent the default node export output method.

Parameters:
&$return The node export code. Leave as FALSE for no change.
$var The node.
$format A string indicating what the export format is, and whether to do anything.

hook_node_export_node_encode_line_alter ( &$  out,
$  tab,
$  key,
$  value,
$  iteration 
)

Override one line of the export code output.

Parameters:
&$out The line of output.
